bike.description: 6011 hydroformed butted aluminum mainframe & swingarm, G2 Geometry, top swing magnesium link, semi-integrated E2 headtube, ABP

components.description: Bontrager 15mm QR thru-axle alloy hub, Shimano M525SL hubs, Bontrager Duster rims 32h
Bontrager XDX 26x2.4, 120 TPI, aramid bead, tubeless ready
Custom Crank Bros Candy C w/cleats
Bontrager Rhythm Elite, 3D forged internally ovalized 7075 alloy shaft, two-bolt rocker head
Bontrager Low Riser OS, 7075 alloy, 690mm width, 25mm rise, 9d backsweep, 4d upsweep, 31.8mm
Bontrager Rhythm Pro OS, 7d rise, 31.8mm clamp
FSA 57 Orbits, E2 1-1/8"-1-1/2", semi-integrated, semi-cartridge bearings
Avid Elixir 5 hydraulic disc, 185mm front/ 160mm rear rotors
Sag gauges for rear shock and front fork / shock pump
